references.paper_title: Training verifiers to solve math word problems
references.reason: This paper introduced a novel approach to solving mathematical word problems using LLMs, which directly influenced the design of the Satori model.

references.paper_title: Measuring mathematical problem solving with the MATH dataset
references.reason: This paper introduced the MATH dataset, a benchmark for evaluating mathematical reasoning abilities that was used to evaluate the Satori model.

references.paper_title: Chain-of-thought prompting elicits reasoning in large language models
references.reason: This paper introduced the Chain-of-Thought (CoT) prompting technique, a crucial concept that forms the basis of the Chain-of-Action-Thought (COAT) reasoning used in Satori.

references.paper_title: Accelerating AI for math with massive open-source instruction data
references.reason: This paper released the OpenMathInstruct-2 dataset which was used as a primary data source for training the Satori model.

references.paper_title: Qwen2.5-math technical report: Toward mathematical expert model via self-improvement
references.reason: This paper introduced the Qwen-2.5-Math-7B model, the base model upon which the Satori model was built.
